greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sigma(n) - phi(n).
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (First 1000 terms from T. D. Noe.)
formula: a(n) > 1 for n > 1; a(n) = 2 if and only if n is prime. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 09 2013
G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} (1 - mu(k))*x^k/(1 - x^k)^2. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 29 2017
mathematica: a[n_] := SeriesCoefficient[Sum[(1-MoebiusMu[k])*x^k/(1-x^k)^2, {k, 1, n}], {x, 0, n}]; Array[a, 74] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 29 2017, after _Ilya Gutkovskiy_ *)
program: a051612 n = a000203 n - a000010 n -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 05 2014
results.author: _Jud McCranie_
